_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three elements and their correspondi: An inferior element gives rise to inferior perceptions, inferior views, and inferior thoughts.
A middling element gives rise to middling perceptions, middling views, and middling thoughts.
A superior element gives rise to superior perceptions, superior views, and superior thoughts.
